data.name: ParameterTooLong
data.value: Parameter '{0}' exceeds maximum length of {1} characters (actual: {2}).
data.comment: Validation error when parameter is too long. {0} is parameter name, {1} is max length, {2} is actual length.

data.name: InvalidSqlPattern
data.value: Parameter '{0}' contains potentially unsafe SQL patterns.
data.comment: Validation error for SQL injection patterns. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: InvalidCharacters
data.value: Parameter '{0}' contains invalid characters.
data.comment: Validation error for invalid characters. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: InvalidXmlPattern
data.value: Parameter '{0}' contains potentially unsafe XML patterns.
data.comment: Validation error for XML injection patterns. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: InvalidPathTraversal
data.value: Parameter '{0}' contains path traversal sequences.
data.comment: Validation error for path traversal attempts. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: InvalidScriptPattern
data.value: Parameter '{0}' contains potentially unsafe script patterns.
data.comment: Validation error for script injection patterns. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: StringRequired
data.value: Parameter '{0}' is required and cannot be null or empty.
data.comment: Validation error for required string parameter. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: StringTooShort
data.value: Parameter '{0}' must be at least {1} characters long (actual: {2}).
data.comment: Validation error when string is too short. {0} is parameter name, {1} is min length, {2} is actual length.

data.name: InvalidEmailFormat
data.value: Parameter '{0}' is not a valid email address.
data.comment: Validation error for invalid email format. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: InvalidUrlFormat
data.value: Parameter '{0}' is not a valid URL.
data.comment: Validation error for invalid URL format. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: InvalidDateTimeFormat
data.value: Parameter '{0}' is not a valid date/time format.
data.comment: Validation error for invalid datetime format. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: InvalidNumberFormat
data.value: Parameter '{0}' is not a valid number.
data.comment: Validation error for invalid number format. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: NumberTooSmall
data.value: Parameter '{0}' must be at least {1} (actual: {2}).
data.comment: Validation error when number is too small. {0} is parameter name, {1} is minimum, {2} is actual value.

data.name: NumberTooLarge
data.value: Parameter '{0}' must be at most {1} (actual: {2}).
data.comment: Validation error when number is too large. {0} is parameter name, {1} is maximum, {2} is actual value.

data.name: InvalidEnumValue
data.value: Parameter '{0}' has an invalid value. Valid values are: {1}.
data.comment: Validation error for invalid enum value. {0} is parameter name, {1} is list of valid values.

data.name: InvalidGuidFormat
data.value: Parameter '{0}' is not a valid GUID format.
data.comment: Validation error for invalid GUID format. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: InvalidRegexPattern
data.value: Parameter '{0}' does not match the required pattern.
data.comment: Validation error when value doesn't match regex pattern. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: CollectionEmpty
data.value: Parameter '{0}' must contain at least one item.
data.comment: Validation error for empty collection. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: CollectionTooLarge
data.value: Parameter '{0}' contains too many items. Maximum allowed: {1} (actual: {2}).
data.comment: Validation error when collection has too many items. {0} is parameter name, {1} is max count, {2} is actual count.

data.name: DuplicateValue
data.value: Parameter '{0}' contains duplicate values. All values must be unique.
data.comment: Validation error for duplicate values in collection. {0} is parameter name.

data.name: GeometryInvalid
data.value: The geometry is invalid: {0}
data.comment: Validation error for invalid geometry. {0} is the specific validation error.

data.name: GeometryTooComplex
data.value: The geometry is too complex. Maximum {0} vertices allowed (actual: {1}).
data.comment: Validation error when geometry has too many vertices. {0} is max vertices, {1} is actual count.

data.name: GeometrySelfIntersecting
data.value: The geometry is self-intersecting.
data.comment: Validation error for self-intersecting geometry.

data.name: GeometryNotClosed
data.value: The polygon geometry is not closed.
data.comment: Validation error for unclosed polygon.

data.name: InvalidCoordinates
data.value: The coordinates are invalid or out of bounds.
data.comment: Validation error for invalid coordinates.

data.name: CoordinateOutOfRange
data.value: Coordinate value {0} is out of range for {1}. Expected between {2} and {3}.
data.comment: Validation error for coordinate out of range. {0} is value, {1} is coordinate type (lat/lon), {2} is min, {3} is max.
